pbe0/def2-TZVPPD.spec_description: PBE0 functional with def2-TZVPPD basis set

pbe0/def2-TZVPPD/ddx-water.spec_description: PBE0 functional with def2-TZVPPD basis set and DDX water (eps = 78.4) using UFF radii and 1.1x scaling factor

dataset_name: OpenFF NAGL2 ESP Timing Benchmark v1.1
dataset_tagline: PBE0/def2-TZVPPD single point calculations of ~1000 diverse molecules.
description: PBE0/def2-TZVPPD/vacuum single point calculations of ~1000 diverse molecules sub-sampled from the ESP50k, multi-BR ESP, and I fragment datasets, to benchmark computational cost.
